casebody.data:
LOCKLEAR
v.
CUMMINGS, et al. 202A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2017 Walter L. Hart, IV, Attorney at Law, for Locklear, Marjorie C. David D. Ward, Attorney at Law, Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Attorney at Law, Katherine Hilkey-Boyatt, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Cummings, Matthew S. (M.D.), et al. Robert A. Ford, Attorney at Law, Demetrius Worley Berry, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Southeastern Regional Medical Center.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of June 2017 by Bingham Hinch to Withdraw as Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of June 2017."
